name: Armament Overdrive
desc: The ballistic and energy weapons of this ship have been put into overdrive to be able to put out respectable firepower despite a lack of mounts. However weapon range past 600 units is significantly reduced.

name: Mirage Shielding
desc: The shields of this ship are modified to reflect light making targeting more difficult the faster the ship moves, become near untargetable when using built-in movement systems. The downside however is that the shields are incredibly inefficient when moving slowly.
short: Shield arc and efficiency changes based on current speed.

name: Small Hangar Bays
desc: This ship has a cramped hangar bays that leaves little room for bomber munition.

name: Errant Phase Coils
desc:
This ship has non-standard phase coil implementation causing timeflow to change at random even when not in phase space. 
Every %s seconds the timeflow of the ship will change randomly between %s.

name: Dynamic Targeting Computer
desc: A targeting computer made for accurate target acquisition on the move, improving weapon turn rate by 50%% but limits their long range potential above 900 units.

name: Energy Stabiliser
desc: Makes bolts of energy last longer before dispersing, increasing energy projectile range by 200 units.

name: Torpedo Prow
desc: The standard extremly armoured prow with built in torpedo tubes. Useful for soaking damage, delivering vital torpedo barrages and ramming.

name: Nova Cannon Prow
desc: A lower armour prow configuration with a built in Nova Cannon. Useful for longer range engagements and supporting fire against slower ships.

name: Safety Removal
desc:
Completely removes safety features from the flux grid allowing even more performance than by mere override.

Increases rate of fire by %s, flux capacity by %s and 0-flux boost by %s but weapon spread by %s. Instead of overloading an explosion occurs dealing up to %s hull damage and sets current flux level to half.
Random malfunctions can occur on high flux levels.
short: Better rate of fire, flux capacity and speed but dangerous overloading.

name: Homebrew Fuel Injector
desc: A special fuel mixture that increases 0-flux boost by 50/40/30/20%% depending on hullsize and causes flares to eject from the engines but they take %s more damage.
short: Eject flares from fragile engines and faster 0-flux boost.

name: Reactive Armour (HE)
tags: pirates, independent, luddic_path, merc, derelict, defensive
desc:
Explosive charges inside the armour plating fire projectiles outward when an armour cell gets bellow %s integrity.

This version fires High Explosive projectiles and gives a 15%% High Explosive resistance until triggered.
short: Damaged armour fires high explosive shrapnel.

name: Reactive Armour (Kinetic)
tags: pirates, independent, hegemony, merc, derelict, defensive
desc:
Explosive charges inside the armour plating fire projectiles outward when an armour cell gets bellow %s integrity.

This version fires Kinetic projectiles and gives a 25%% EMP resistance until triggered.

name: #Reactive Armour (Frag)
tags: pirates, independent, luddic_church, merc, derelict, offensive
desc:
Explosive charges inside the armour plating fire projectiles outward when an armour cell gets bellow %s integrity.

This version fires Fragmentation projectiles with proximity triggers and gives a 10%% Armor damage resistance before fired.

name: Martyr Pilots
desc:
Fighters launched from this ship are exclusively piloted by fanatics who will attempt to crash into their target once they have taken heavy damage.

Once a fighter is bellow %s hull it turns into a missile dealing High Explosive damage equal to %s times its maximum hull. Fighters without crew are not effected.
short: Fighters will ram the enemy once they suffered enough damage.

name: Regenerative Phase Coils
desc: Brings the ship deeper into phase space where the ship is continually restored to a previous version of itself restoring armour. Crew and fragile instruments suffer from increased p-space exposure reducing CR while phased. Also slightly increases while phased performance.
short: While phased armour is restored but CR diminishes.

name: #Emergency Recall Beacons
desc: Recall beacons on the fighters teleport them to the carrier whenever their hull reaches %s but their engagement range is only %s of the normal range.
short: Recalls critically damaged fighters to the carrier.
